name: Muzigle Pvt. Ltd
tag_list: muzigle, indian-music-online, download-indian-music, music-online, listening-and-downloading-indian-music, karaoke, indian-karaoke
overview:
Muzigle is the world’s largest social music network for global Indians. One could stream the music for free and also download for a small fee at Muzigle.com.

Muzigle aims to provide the best tools artists need to create, nurture, and strengthen relationships with Indian music lovers across the globe. With these relationships the artists could promote and profit from their works.Muzigle gives the artists the power to digitally distribute their works practically at no cost to them.

At Muzigle, music lovers and fans enjoy a great listening experience. One can find Albums and Tracks from their favorite artists and films as well as top notch new talented artists at a much higher quality of up to 256 kbps. One could also create a profile to connect with your favorite artists, share the music they like with friends on FaceBook, Orkut, MySpace etc. One could create playlists, upload videos and photos. Moreover one could bring out the singer in them by singing tracks on Karaoke which could be shared across your social networks.

At Muzigle, record labels have the resources to drive sales of their Albums/Tracks. Since the financial success of record labels majorely depends on the strength and breadth of the digital distribution they have on the web, Muzigle would be a great place to start with to create an effective digital distribution across the globe. Muzigle provides its user, a dashboard, to track everything that is happening with ones content and report it back to you so one understands what is working and what isn’t. One gets to create microsites for different albums to promote effectively as well.
